original_title: ADB, WB,USAID, JICA ready to assist restructuring of CEB : Kanchana
original_body_lines: The Asian Development Bank (ADB), World Bank (WB), USAID and JICA have assured their assistance for the restructuring process of the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB), Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara said.

The Minister tweeted that "Progress on the restructuring of CEB was discussed yesterday. ADB, World Bank, USAID & JICA has communicated on the assistance they can offer. Roadmap & timeline will be submitted to the Cabinet. Reforms that can be implemented before the final Act, will be initiated next week".
